Module ec.edu.epn.snakegame
Package ec.edu.view

Class ScreenGameView

java.lang.Object
ec.edu.view.ScreenGameView
public class ScreenGameView extends Object
Shows initial, menu and game screen. Also check rules, create userInterface.
